text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
――Well then, Counter-clockwise, 2000m. 
……Let's get in to position.

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
――There's the same kind of tension as a real race. 
I wonder how Bubble-san is going to run against her today……?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer
text_block_list.text:
How will one of the rumored 『Elite Four』 do against 
someone like Symboli Rudolf? I'll be sure to get a good look――
(――Clank!!)

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, the same as last time……! 
Bubble-san is taking the lead again……!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
……But, last time, wasn't her acceleration at the start more amazing? 
It feels like she isn't creating a lead as big――

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer
text_block_list.text:
They're about to enter the second half, but what's 
with her small lead……! She's going up against that 
Symboli Rudolf, she'll catch up without a doubt……!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Aaah, the lead is growing smaller! She couldn't hold 
the lead……! Like this, it'll be worse than before――

――Wrong. It wasn't that Bubble Gum Fellow couldn't increase 
her lead and was being passed. This was what we chose to do.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――It's a fight, Prez!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: So that's your plan……!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer
text_block_list.text:
As expected, that was reckless……! 
To compete head-to-head against Symboli Rudolf……!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
But……huh……? 
Doesn't it seem like she's faster than before……!?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――In the second half, just match with her?
choice_data_list: Don't take a big lead like last time
Don't take a big lead like last time

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ……Can I ask why?
choice_data_list: Competing head-to-head gets you fired up
Competing head-to-head gets you fired up

text_block_list.text:
That was what I learned from analyzing Bubble Gum 
Fellow's running to this date. Head-to-head competition 
causes her fighting spirit to burn stronger.

In those moments, her running becomes sharper and stronger, 
everything increases. In those moments――――explosively so.

To create a chance of victory against someone on the level 
of Symboli Rudolf, we should bet on that explosive power……!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
So, in other words, to increase the length of time I'm 
competing directly against Prez, match with her……is it?
choice_data_list: Right. Stand ready, and accept it head on
Right. Stand ready, and accept it head on

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
……Hahaa! That sounds like the craziest plan 
ever, doesn't it……!? I'm in. I'll go with that.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Challenging Prez head on, with my strongest――――I'll win!!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
No way!? She's keeping up longer than before……! 
Maybe, she can……!?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaa!!!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
In honor of your bravery, and fighting spirit, 
let me once again pay my respects――

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ――――Haaa!!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa, haa……!! 
Kuu……once again, it wasn't enough……!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
――The courage to face someone like me 『Head-to-head』. And the 
powerful run to make that possible. ……Both of them were magnificent.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
With that same courageous spirit, I hope you'll continue 
to run in the Twinkle Series. ……I'll be cheering for you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well then. Thank you for today――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
…………Prez……―― 
Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san……! ……Sorry. 
Even though you helped me so much……I still lost.
choice_data_list: No, it was me who was lacking……!
No, it was me who was lacking……!

text_block_list.text:
If I had been able to do more, maybe it would have been enough 
to reach Symboli Rudolf. Even now……it was frustrating.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
……Fufuu. That's amazing. 
You seem more frustrated than me.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Hey. About after this――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――Okay, cheers!

At Bubble Gum Fellow's suggestion, we were holding 
an 『After Party』 for both of us. The canned juice 
I drank strangely tasted better than usual.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
But still, it looks like you bought a lot of snacks, huh. 
With so many choices, it'll be hard to decide……wait, this――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Bubble gum! And it's my usual……! 
Trainer-san, did you buy this for me?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Hahaa, you get me, don't you? 
Then, I'll gratefully accept.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I like all kinds of snacks, but this is special. 
……To me, it's kind of like a charm of sorts.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: To help expand my dreams, you see.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
……Hey. 
Are you able to blow a bubble now?

Now that she mentions it, I haven't tried since then. 
When I put the gum in my mouth and try to blow a bubble――

――It was shocking how easily I was able to blow a big bubble. 
How much I struggled with it before seemed like a lie.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Hahaa, what a nice sound! 
……So? Has your dream grown now too?

……I nod. And then, 
I put to words the growing feelings I had right now.

Straight-forward, fearlessly, expanding that dream without stopping. 
Together with her……I had a dream that could not be broken.

Bubble Gum Fellow started blowing a bubble. 
And one that grew large enough to completely hide her face――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
This is a declaration. 
……Let's make it happen, with me――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Together, we'll grow that dream. One that will turn 
the entire Racing World on its head, with a bang!

……That dream I wanted to grow, had now turned in 
to the strength to reach out and take her hand――
